results.title: QuickBooks System Requirements - Pro, Premier, Enterprise Desktop
results.description: Find out what your computer needs to run QuickBooks Desktop 2023 at its best experience. The operating system, hardware, software, and other requirements for QuickBooks Desktop 2023 are detailed in the following information.

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Internet Speeds and Recommended Operating Systems
items.answer:
Here are the pages for Windows and Mac versions, respectively, if you are not sure of the operating system that your computer uses.

  • Windows PC: 4GB or more RAM and an Intel Core i5 or similar processor running Windows 10 (2015 or newer). Note: To print forms, you must have Adobe Reader 11.0 or higher.
  • Mac: OS X 10.13 High Sierra or a later version.
  • Internet Connection: 3 MBPS or more for the internet connection.

On Linux operating systems, you can use QuickBooks Online, QuickBooks Online Accountant, and QuickBooks Self-Employed through a web browser but not QuickBooks Online Advanced.
items.title: QuickBooks System Requirements - Pro, Premier, Enterprise Desktop

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Minimum Operating Systems and Internet Speeds
items.answer:
Although the above specifications are advised, QuickBooks will run with the minimum systems and internet speeds:

  • Windows PC: 2 GB or more RAM and an Intel Core i3 or comparable processor from 2013 or newer.
  • Mac: El Capitan 10.11 or a newer version.
  • Internet Connection: 1.5 MBPS
items.title: QuickBooks System Requirements - Pro, Premier, Enterprise Desktop

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Supported Web Browsers
items.answer:
In general, QuickBooks supports the three latest browser versions. Older versions are not always supported by us.
Both web and mobile devices are supported with the following web browsers:

Note: Internet Explorer is no longer supported.

  • Google Chrome: 78 or a newer version
  • Mozilla Firefox: 76 or a newer version. Note: The Firefox PDF plugin is also required to preview and print forms on Mac OS.
  • Microsoft Edge: Version 75 of Microsoft Edge or newer
  • Safari: Version 12 or later of Safari (Mac only)
  • Opera: 68 or a newer version
  • Samsung: Version 10 or newer for Samsung
items.title: QuickBooks System Requirements - Pro, Premier, Enterprise Desktop

items.question: Know about Supported Mobile Operating Systems
items.answer:
iPads and iPhones
Your device must be running iOS 11.1 or newer to work with Apple items.

Android-based Tablets and Smartphones
Your device must run Nougat 7.1.1 or newer to be suitable for Android products.

items.question: Operating Systems
items.answer:
Do you make use of Windows 8.1?

After January 10, 2023, Microsoft will stop offering security updates and support for computers running Windows 8.1. Because of this, Windows 8.1 will not be supported by QuickBooks 2023, and it cannot be installed on it.

To learn more, see QuickBooks Desktop no longer supports Windows 8.1.

  • Windows 11, 64-bit, natively installed
  • Windows 10, all 64-bit editions, natively installed
  • Windows Server 2022, Standard and Essentials
  • Windows Server 2019, Standard and Essentials
  • Windows Server 2016, Standard and Essentials
  • Windows Server 2012 R2, Standard and Essentials
  • Windows Server 2012, Standard and Essentials

Note: You must use Windows directly, not through an emulator or virtual environment, in order to use QuickBooks.

  • Windows Server 2016, Standard and Essentials
  • Windows Server 2012 R2, Standard and Essentials
  • Windows Server 2012, Standard and Essentials

Note: Windows 10 S Mode and Linux are not supported.

items.question: Hardware and Operating System Requirements
items.answer:
QuickBooks Desktop 2023 won't run on a 32-bit version of Windows; it needs a 64-bit version.

Processor:2.4 GHz minimumRAM (Workstation):8 GB minimum, 16 GB recommendedRAM (Server):● 1-5 Users: 8 GB
● 10 Users: 12 GB
● 15 Users: 16 GB
● 20+ users: 20+ GBDisk Space:2.5GB of storage space (data files require additional space). 60MB of additional software are included with the installation files for Microsoft.NET 4.8 Runtime.

● Additional requirements for QuickBooks Connected Services services using Intuit Data Protect include:
● Needs at least 4.0GB of RAM
● Double the size of the largest file scheduled for backup, plus 100MB, or double the size for restoration. Only the work folder LocalApplicationData+\"Intuit\Intuit Data Protect\" is needed.

Note: Solid-state drives (SSDs) are the best place to keep your QuickBooks data file for optimal performance.Windows:● Windows' North American version
● When set to English, regional settings are supported.
● When hosting multi-user access, the server computer must have administrator rights.
● Natively installed, not requiring the use of emulation software or virtual environments.Optical Drive:For physical CD installations, a 4X DVD-ROM drive is required.Screen Resolution:● Display designed for up to two extended monitors at 1280 x 1024 resolution or higher.
● Best optimized for the computer's default DPI level.

Other Hardware Devices

Here are the supported devices you can use if you use the mobile version of QuickBooks Desktop's Warehouse Manager:

  • Zebra TC20/TC25/TC51 Mobile Computer (Android 4.4 & higher) is advised.
  • Mobile Computer Zebra MC40 (Android 4.4 & above)

Additionally supported by QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise 23.0:

  • Honeywell Voyager 1602g Pocket Barcode Scanner
  • Symbol CS3070
  • Socket Mobile CHS 7CI
items.title: QuickBooks System Requirements - Pro, Premier, Enterprise Desktop

items.question: Software Compatibility
items.answer:
Many more apps are integrated with QuickBooks. Here is a list of the most popular apps available to you. At the Intuit App Store, you can also find more.

Note: Making advantage of these features may be improved by adding more RAM.

  • Office 2021
  • Office 2019
  • Office 2016 (including Outlook 2016) both on 32 and 64-bit
  • Office 2013 and 365 (including Outlook 2013) both on 32 and 64-bit.
  • With Microsoft Outlook 2016–2021, Microsoft Outlook with Microsoft 365, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Outlook.com, and other email clients that support SMTP, you can send estimates, invoices, and other forms.
  • Microsoft Word 2021, 2019, 2016, 2013, or Microsoft 365 (which includes 64-bit) are required for letter preparation.
  • Reports can only be exported using Microsoft Excel 2021, 2019, 2016, 2013, or Microsoft 365 (64-bit supported).
  • Microsoft Outlook 2021, 2019 (32 and 64-bit), 2016, or 2013 are required for contact synchronization.
  • TurboTax 2022 (Personal and Business)
  • QuickBooks Point of Sale V19.0
  • Lacerte 2022
  • Pro-Series tax year 2022
  • QuickBooks Desktop for Mac 2023, 2022, and 2021
  • Quicken 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019, 2018, 2017, and 2016
  • Adobe Acrobat Reader: Version 9.0 or later of Adobe Acrobat Reader is needed for Business Planner, Payroll, and reading forms.
  • A minimum connection speed of 56 Kbps is required for payroll and other online features and services, with a recommended connection speed of 1 MBPS.
  • Internet Explorer 11

items.question: Anti-malware and Antivirus Software Compatibility
items.answer:
The following antivirus and antimalware tools were used to test QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2023, Premier 2023, and Enterprise 23-0.

To get the maximum performance out of these tools and QuickBooks, you might need to change some settings.

Antivirus Software

  • McAfee
  • Avast
  • Bitdefender
  • Norton
  • Kaspersky
  • Trend Micro Security
  • Webroot
  • Cylance (Internet/Regression Only)
  • ESET
  • Panda Dome
  • Sophos
  • Avira
  • Symantec
  • F-Secure

Anti-malware Software

  • Bitdefender
  • AVG
  • Malwarebytes
  • Spybot
  • Emsisoft
  • McAfee
  • Avast
  • Webroot
  • ZoneAlarm
  • Kaspersky
  • F-Secure

It should be noted that while QuickBooks will function on systems running a Redundant Array of Cheap Disks (RAID), doing so is not advised as it could make QuickBooks run slowly.

TLS 1.2 is a need for QuickBooks Desktop 2023 in order for the connected services to function properly.

results.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download
results.description: In this article learn about the QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features, Download, System Requirements. QuickBooks Desktop 2023 is going to subscription mode.

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Release 4_69 (R4_92) May 2023
items.answer:
Inventory Changes

  • Use Categories in Add/Edit Multiple List Entries and copy-paste from Excel to onboard and alter item categories at scale.
  • Use the new Welcome screen to comprehend the significance of the Categories.
  • Category Center has been renamed Category List to sound more like Item List.

Web-connector Changes

The consent screen now has a new preference type, umpnotneeded. This setting disables the consent screen's unattended access option, giving developers the choice to integrate the app and only carry out data synchronization while QuickBooks is operational.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Release 4_101 (R4_101) - April 2023
items.answer:
Payroll

  • Through Guideline 401(k), you can now offer 401(k) retirement benefits to employees directly from QuickBooks Desktop. Access to Guideline 401(k) is available to all users of Enhanced & Assisted Payroll.
  • Log in as the administrator to QuickBooks Desktop, then sign in to your Intuit account to access and register for the Guideline 401(k) retirement plan.
  • Redesigned the employee center to make it simpler for you to enter the necessary data for your employees.
  • Updated discovery items and employee info pages to assist you identify incomplete employee profiles and understand the advantages of comprehensive employee profiles.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Release 3 (R3) - October 2022
items.answer:
Inventory

  • Use the category list view to manage your inventories. When transferring multiple items, using Find and Select, or creating reports, use categories. Note: Release 1 (R1) will no longer support the Categories feature; only Release 3 (R3) and beyond will support it.
  • View the report on Expiration Status. Filter by serial numbers or item lot expiration dates.

Intercompany transactions

  • Use the Intercompany dashboard and Reports' date-range filters.
  • Edit all fields on an Intercompany General Journal entry minus the amount and account.
  • When you authorize Intercompany transactions, you can alter the default due-to-account.

Cash Flow Hub

Direct connect banks are present in all Cash Flow Hub accounts. Included multiple banks to track balances in one place.

1099 changes

The year placement on the new 1099 NEC & MISC forms was changed. According to IRS rules, the FATCA filing box number and subsequent box numbers on the 1099 MISC form have also been changed

.View-only mode

Learn more about QuickBooks Desktop's view-only mode once your membership has expired or been cancelled.

Money Transmission License (MTL) Payments compliance

Payment receipts are now MTL compliant following the processing of online payments. Receipts now include the exclusive MTL features and disclosures, including Payment Amount, Total Amount, Date of Transaction, Payment Method, and Auth Code.

Issue Fixes

  • The Inventory Valuation Summary Report is compatible with the Software Developer Kit API.
  • The price rule on an item with a sales price of $10,000 or more is supported by invoices.
  • From the No Company Open screen keyboard shortcut, enter opens a company file.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Cash Flow Hub (NEW)
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0.

Accessible: From the menu bar select, Company > Cash Flow Hub.

You can quickly examine, manage, and track your cash flow using Cash Flow Hub. It serves as your central hub and gives you access to the accounts you track to keep track of your available cash, such as bank accounts, credit cards, and loans. You can control your money-in and money-out transactions from here as well. Clients may go over the account balances, Adding accounts to the list of accounts being watched, Analyze trends in cash balances, Monitor the performance of your cash over a given time period, Control past-due invoices and payments and Examine any reports pertaining to cash flow information.

As of the original 2023 product (R1) release, Cash Flow Hub is accessible to all 2023 Desktop Plus, Enterprise, and Accountant users in the US. Either the Company menu or the Reports menu can be used to access it. On the Home Screen, you may also choose Cash Flow Hub from the shortcut sidebar to reach it.

Manage the accounts you want to be visible. To see reports with more specifics, click.

View the money coming in and going out over specified time periods. Access to linked transaction operations and reporting is conveniently provided by each row.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Upgraded Mileage Tracker Feature (NEW)
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0.

Accessible: From the menu bar, select Company > Track Vehicle Mileage

Although vehicle mileage monitoring is not a brand-new feature for QuickBooks, it will be done in a completely different way in 2023. All users of 2023 Desktop Plus, Enterprise, and Accountant have access to Track Vehicle Mileage. It is reachable from the Company menu.

Only mobile devices that support iOS have the ability to track mileage. Additionally, a connection and login to an Intuit account are required for this capability. You should be aware that only users of QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise, Pro Plus, and Premier Plus can track mileage on mobile devices that support iOS.

This tool allows you to easily record, monitor, and view company mileage in one location using a desktop computer or a mobile device with an iOS operating system so you can appropriately report it to the IRS and chargeback clients. Additionally, by combining mileage information for all work travels and automatically using the most recent IRS rates to calculate deductions, you may make filing your year-end taxes simpler. By giving your clients a thorough mileage log with trip locations, you can more properly bill back your clients. Effortlessly view, track, and run a report of all business trips in one location to easily manage spending.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Improved Banking Connections (NEW)
items.answer:
The old ways of bank connectivity via bank servers Desktop provided have been used by hundreds of thousands of businesses to download their bank and credit card transactions. Because traditional methods are prone to security issues and connection stability issues, many banks are switching to API-based connectivity, which is the approach taken by QuickBooks Online.

Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0.

Accessible: From the menu bar, select Banking > Bank Feeds > Set Up Bank Feed for an Account

QuickBooks Desktop, which is brand-new for 2023, delivers enhanced banking access with a modernized platform to address connectivity and security issues. Online banking is enhanced in at least three ways due to improved banking connectivity:

  • Many banks that previously just provided bank downloads and didn't give direct connectivity will now are reachable.
  • Banking connections consistency, disruption, and downtime will all increase.
  • QuickBooks Desktop can be programmed to automatically download financial data at user-specified intervals, and it will retrieve the bank (or credit card) information.

From Bank Feeds in the Banking menu, you can configure improved banking connectivity. Additionally, you may access it from the Home Screen's shortcut sidebar by choosing Bank Feeds.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Improved Payment Links Tracking
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0 with an active QuickBooks Payments6 account.

Accessible: From the menu bar, select Customers > Payment Links

With an active QuickBooks Payments account, it is available to users of QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0. Additionally, it can be accessed from the menu bar by choosing Customers > Payment Links.

Sending a payment link allows you to rapidly collect money for purchases that don't need an invoice, and the new payment links dashboard lets you see the status. It is useful for obtaining money without making an invoice for initial consultations, advance deposits, and more. The new payment links dashboard makes it simple to keep track of the progress of your request and issue reminders. Send a link to your consumers by text message or email to request payment so they can pay online.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Node Card Reader (NEW)
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0 with an active QuickBooks Payments6 account.

Accessible: From the menu bar, select Customers > Receive Payment

Latest Node Card Reader

With an active QuickBooks Payments account, it is available to users of QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0. Pick Customers > Receive Payment from the menu bar to go there.

QuickBooks Desktop now supports a new card reader. A new reader has been introduced that enables you to accept contactless cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and a variety of other types of payment from your clients in person. Furthermore, since QuickBooks Payments is integrated with QuickBooks Desktop, when you start utilizing the new QuickBooks Node Card Reader, the payments you receive are instantly recorded and matched, ensuring that your books remain structured without any additional work on your part.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Equifax Verification of Employment and Earnings (NEW!)
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023 and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0 with an active QuickBooks Payroll subscription.

Accessible: From the menu bar, select Edit > Preferences > Benefits & HR > select to opt in or out of the feature.

For the first time in 2023, QuickBooks Desktop and Equifax have teamed up to automate requests for verification of employment and income information for users of the active Desktop Payroll service. Because the verification process has been automated, responding to information requests of this sort is now quicker and simpler. Being conducted through Equifax's security measures makes the process considerably safer as well. This means that employees will often receive a decision on a loan, credit, or aid more quickly.

The QuickBooks Desktop preferences now have a Benefits and HR tab. The Company Preferences (QuickBooks >> Edit >> Preferences >> Benefits & HR >> Company Preferences >> Income & Employment Verification) contain a section titled Income & Employment Verification.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: HCM with 401(k) Guidelines (NEW)
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023 and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0 with an active Assisted Payroll8 subscription.

With an active Assisted Payroll subscription, it comes with QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, Premier Plus, Accountant Plus 2023, and all editions of Desktop Enterprise 23.0. You can start by adding the 401k payroll deduction and, if necessary, the addition to your list of payroll items. Then, Choose Employees > Employee Center from the menu bar to assign the 401(k) items to particular employees.

Your employees will greatly benefit from retirement programs. When users have a subscription to QuickBooks Desktop Assisted Payroll2, Guideline and QuickBooks have teamed to offer users of QuickBooks Desktop reasonable, fully integrated 401(k) plans. Users can select and set up a plan in QuickBooks Desktop that is suitable for their business and staff. After they are set up and running aided payroll with their new contributions, there are no further actions for them to take because Guideline receives the information and contributions automatically.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Purchase Order and Bill Workflow Approvals (NEW)
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise (Platinum, Diamond) 23.0 and Enterprise Accountant 23.0

Accessible: To setup the approval process, login as the Admin user. From the menu bar, select Company > Set Up Approval Processes

This feature is in QuickBooks Enterprise Accountant 23.0 and QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise (Platinum, Diamond) 23.0. Users needs to Log in as the Admin user to configure the approval process. From the menu bar, choose Company > Set up Approval Processes to access it.

With the option to approve purchase orders and bills in a single dashboard, you can maintain business supervision and aid in reducing fraud. With the bill and purchase order approval workflow, you may reliably delegate accounts payable and purchase order activities.

For repeatable purchase order and bill workflow approvals, utilize time-saving business templates that are easily customizable. Ongoing monitoring of approved transactions with automated audit trail information, such as the name of the approver, the creator's information, and any relevant comments automated prompt notifications to staff members so they can act before the approval deadline.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Inventory Expiration Dates on Lot Numbers (NEW)
items.answer:
Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise (Platinum, Diamond) and Enterprise Accountant 23.0.

The inventory expiration dates on lot number feature is in the Enterprise Accountant 23.0 and QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise (Platinum, Diamond). It can be accessed by signing in as the Admin user. Select Edit > Preferences > Items & Inventory from the menu bar. Select the Serial/Lot No. & Expiration tab after clicking the Advanced Inventory Settings button. Once enabled, you can pick which items need a lot number and, if necessary, an expiration date.

With this feature's thorough multi-level categorization and support for expiration dates, you may manage your inventory more successfully. By giving inventory expiration dates and putting them in transactions like sales orders, invoices, etc., you can minimize business losses and sell goods quickly.

By including expiration dates in client interactions, it also aids in lowering business liability. Utilize reports on inventory that has expired or is going to expire by lot or serial number, as well as a history of transactions, to take prompt action. By quickly replacing and restocking out-of-date products from inventory, inventory can be kept current.
items.title: QuickBooks Desktop 2023 Pricing, Features and Download

meta_url.path: › small & mid sized business accounting automation software: dancing numbers

items.question: Intercompany Transactions (NEW)
items.answer: Included with: QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise (Platinum, Diamond) 23.0, Enterprise Accountant 23.0

items.question: Reports Performance Optimization (NEW)
items.answer:
Included with: All editions of QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise and Enterprise Accountant 23.0.

Accessible: When preparing reports with a large amount of data.

With some of the more complicated reports in QuickBooks, users with large company files frequently encounter challenges with report compilation time. An illustration of these reports is the A/R Aging Reports. The improvements implemented by QuickBooks for 2023 will improve report compilation performance for bigger company file sizes (>300 MB). Although the reporting interface won't change, users should notice that these reports load more quickly than they did in earlier versions of QuickBooks Desktop. Enterprise Accountant 23.0 and all editions of QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise have access to it.

items.question: NEW and Improved! QuickBooks Desktop Mac Plus 2023
items.answer:
By scheduling and paying bills in QuickBooks, which then marks the payment paid automatically and alerts you when the money is transferred, you can save time. After paying vendors using a card or bank transfer, you can increase your financial flexibility by sending them money via physical check or bank transfer. There are additional fees for paying with a credit card, using the optional Fast ACH and Fast Check expedites services, and other options.

Additionally, automating bill inputs in QuickBooks might help you save time. Simply connect a shared macOS Photos album to your company file, and as new receipt transactions are uploaded, they will automatically pre-populate for approval. Maintain organization by grouping your customers according to their types, statuses, locations, and balances. Besides all, you may quickly add images of invoices, receipts, or other documents to your company file via automatic upload from a shared Photos album on macOS.
